channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: After-Christmas sales are live — shop over 100+ hand-picked deals from Amazon, Walmart, Target, and more
item.description: After-Christmas sales are officially live, and I've rounded up today's best deals that are worth buying from Amazon, Best Buy, Target, Walmart, and more.

item.title: Clouds Are Weirder at the Top Than We Thought
item.description: A new type of lidar is allowing physicists to study cloud tops at a resolution 100 to 1,000 times higher than before.

item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 : voici notre sélection d’accessoires indispensables à (s’)offrir
item.description: La Nintendo Switch 2 est sans nul doute la console vedette de cette fin d'année et des fêtes de Noël. Voici une sélection d'accessoires que nous avons testés et que nous vous recommandons.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Friday, December 26 (game #1432)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Friday, December 26 (game #929)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Friday, December 26 (game #663)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: I’ve tried the best phone cameras in 2025 – here's what the Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra needs to bring to the table in 2026
item.description: There's never been a better time to buy a smartphone camera, and there's never been a better time for Samsung to rethink the Galaxy S26 Ultra.

item.title: The Fitbit Inspire 3 is back to its lowest-ever price on Amazon
item.description: The Fitbit Inspire 3 could be exactly what you need to kick off your fitness goals in the new year – and it's now down to its lowest-ever price on Amazon.

item.title: WiiM's first ever wireless speaker hits (almost) all the right notes
item.description: Buy the Sound on WiiM, would you? I support you – although I'd always recommend reading this review first…

item.title: Cet ultrabook Lenovo avec écran OLED 3K et Ryzen AI 9 perd 25 % de son prix pour Noël
item.description: Dalle OLED 3K, puce Ryzen AI 9, RAM généreuse, bonne autonomie... Le PC portable Copilot+ Lenovo Yoga Pro 7 ne manque clairement pas de points forts. Si vous souhaitez changer votre équipement de travail et miser sur cette bonne machine, sachez que la Fnac et Darty la proposent actuellement à 1 279,99 euros au lieu de 1 699,99 euros.

item.title: ‘Fallout’ Revisits Its Most Controversial Change From the Games
item.description: The second episode of its sophomore season sees 'Fallout' entrench its big new arc in a look back to its recent past.

item.title: I re-created Google’s cute Gemini ad with my own kid’s stuffie, and I wish I hadn’t
item.description: When your kid starts showing a preference for one of their stuffed animals, you're supposed to buy a backup in case it goes missing. I've heard this advice again and again, but never got around to buying a second plush deer once "Buddy" became my son's obvious favorite. Neither, apparently, did the parents in Google's […]

item.title: I tried using a dock for my Asus ROG Ally for the first time — and it could draw me back to living room gaming
item.description: I'd long since given up on 'couch gaming', but docking my Asus ROG Ally

item.title: How to explain the importance of a VPN to your parents this Christmas
item.description: What else would you chat about over Christmas dinner?

item.title: What's the most efficient type of electric heater you can buy? Here are the best options to avoid sky-high bills
item.description: From fan heaters to oil-filled radiators, we explain which portable heater will warm your home best, without sending your power bill through the roof.
